summary: This bill, the Federal Firearm Licensee Act, aims to modernize the regulation of firearm sales. It addresses dealer accountability, strengthens security measures, defines key terms, clarifies record-keeping procedures (including electronic databases and video surveillance), increases penalties for violations, and expands background check requirements. It also regulates facilitators of firearm transfers and mandates inspections. The bill seeks to improve public safety by targeting illegal firearm trafficking and enhancing enforcement.
